DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety successful interventional therapy unblock blood vessel maintain treatment coronary in-stent restenosis paclitaxel -eluting PTCA- balloon catheter ( 3μg/mm2 balloon surface area ) versus paclitaxel-eluting stent Taxus® Liberte , reference diameter coronary artery stenosis 2.5mm-4.0mm length ≤30mm .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Paclitaxel-eluting Balloon Paclitaxel-eluting Stent
